esdc.title: Te Umanga Mahi me te Whanaketanga Hapori o Kānata

hero.title: Te hanga i tētahi kaimahi mohio, urutau, āhuru mōwai
hero.description: Whakauru ki ngā ratonga mahi, ngā painga me ngā kaupapa tautoko e āwhina ana i ngā tāngata kia angitu

ei.title: Āwhina Mahi
ei.description: Āwhina pūtea mo te wā poto i a koe e rapu mahi ana, e whakapai ake ana i ō pūkenga rānei
ei.details: Ko te Āwhina Mahi (ĀM) he whakarato tautoko moni wā poto ki ngā tāngata kore mahi i a rātou e rapu mahi ana, e whakapai ake ana i ō rātou pūkenga rānei. Ka wātea ngā painga auau ki ngā tāngata ka ngaro tō rātou mahi ehara i te hē o rātou ake, kua kohikohi hoki ngā haora ārai e tika ana.

oas.title: Haumarutanga Kaumātua
oas.description: Utu o ia marama mō ngā kaumātua 65 tau me runga ake
oas.details: Ko te Haumarutanga Kaumātua (HK) he utu ia marama e wātea ana ki te nuinga o ngā tāngata 65 tau, neke atu rānei. Kāore koe i te hiahia kia mahi kia whiwhi i te HK. Ko te moni ka whiwhi koe ka whakawhirinaki ki te roa o tō noho i muri i te 18 tau.

cpp.title: Mahere Penihana o Kānata
cpp.description: Kaupapa penihana whakatā whakapau mō ngā kaimahi
cpp.details: Ko te Mahere Penihana o Kānata (MPK) he kaupapa ārai pāpori whakapau, e hāngai ana ki ngā whiwhinga. Ko tētahi wāhi o te pūnaha whiwhinga whakatā o Kānata. Ka whakarato te MPK i ngā painga matua o te whakatā, hauātanga me te oranga.

jobSearch.title: Rapunga Mahi
jobSearch.description: Kimihia ngā whai mahi puta noa i te motu ki te Pēke Mahi
jobSearch.details: Ko te Pēke Mahi te ratonga mahi ā-motu. Rapua ngā mano mahi, tūhurahia ngā ia o te mākete kaimahi, me te uru atu ki ngā taputapu whakamahere mahi hei āwhina i a koe ki te kimi i tō whai hou.

benefitsFinder.title: Kimi Painga
benefitsFinder.description: Kitea ko ēhea ngā painga me ngā ratonga kāwanatanga e tika ana mōu
benefitsFinder.details: Whakautua ētahi pātai ngāwari kia whiwhi rārangi whaiaro o ngā painga me ngā ratonga ā-motu, ā-rohe, ā-rohe hoki e tika ana kia whiwhi koe.

chat.title: Pātai ki a EVA
chat.subtitle: Kaiawhina Mahi Mariko
chat.placeholder: Me pēhea taku āwhina i a koe i tēnei rā?
